data.title: PEA rules out irregularities in overseas electricity distribution
data.description: Deputy governor vows PEA will act if any illegal activities come to light

data.title: Motor Expo 2024 sees record bookings despite market challenges
data.description: Toyota leads the bookings followed by BYD and Honda, reflecting growing consumer interest despite challenges from stricter lending policies

data.title: No tolls on Pak Chong-Korat M6 Motorway during 5-day New Year break
data.description: The Highways Department waives toll fees to ensure motorists heading to the Northeast can bypass heavy traffic in the heart of Nakhon Ratchasima

data.title: Foxconn subsidiary gets BOI privileges to build factories in Thailand
data.description: Taiwanese firm to establish two semiconductor factories in Chonburi and Rayong, with an investment of 10.5 billion baht, creating over 1,400 jobs

data.title: Efforts to block malicious apps declared successful
data.description: Ministry of Digital Economy and Society teams up with Google to shield Thai internet users from dangerous cyber threats

data.title: Luxury, wellness, romance: TAT’s strategy to capture elite tourists
data.description: TAT aims to boost tourism revenue by promoting events unique to Thailand in high-spending markets like the US, China and the Middle East

data.title: New era dawns for Thai brand Pañpuri
data.description: Thailand’s leading fragrance and wellness brand to spread its international wings following acquisition by Japan’s Kosé Group

data.title: Photo exhibit by HRH Princess Maha Chakri Sirindhorn goes live
data.description: ‘Free at Last’ presents 150 images captured outdoors during 2024 and can be enjoyed until March 16

data.title: Blending ancient culture and modern luxury
data.description: There is no dearth of spas or wellness centres in Thailand or even in the capital city. Though finding the gems in a country renowned for its wellness programmes is rare. Take a moment to relax in prep for the new year.

data.title: No one damaged by The iCon Group, says jailed CEO
data.description: Letter from jail penned by the group’s founder and posted on Facebook insists he is innocent of the charges and vows to explain further

data.title: Thailand’s vintage collectables find a home at House of Museums 2
data.description: Established by National Artist Anek Nawigamune and his wife Wanna, this community-driven museum celebrates the kingdom’s rich cultural heritage

data.title: Sandy Kraokaew Stuvik gears up for thrilling
data.description: Sandy Kraokaew Stuvik, an accomplished Thai racing driver representing Winhere by B-Quik Absolute Racing in the #37 Audi R8 LMS Evo2, is set to battle for glory in the highly anticipated finale of the Thailand Super Series 2024 this weekend.

data.title: Global Economic Recovery on the Horizon: Navigating Uncertainty in 2025
data.description: Wealth Forum Thailand 2025 held by KBank THE WISDOM surveys the Thai and global economic landscape to identify ‘new frontiers of investment opportunity’

data.title: Blockchain payments to transform cross-border transactions
data.description: Kasikorn Bank, Orbix Technology and StraitsX launch international payment system to enhance cross-border transactions

data.title: Chevron tests drones to boost safety and exploration in Thailand's Gulf
data.description: Chevron Thailand Exploration and Production, Ltd. has successfully completed a proof of concept using unmanned aerial vehicles, or drones, to enhance safety and security in petroleum production.

data.title: Stay safe the year-end holiday shopping season with good cyber hygiene practices
data.description: As the highly anticipated shopping season such as 12.12 and Year-End Sales draw near, Palo Alto Networks emphasizes the need for heightened cybersecurity vigilance.

data.title: Thailand, Germany reaffirm commitment to railway cooperation
data.description: Renewed Joint Statement of Intent aims to enhance Thailand's rail infrastructure, promote sustainable transportation

data.title: Can Thailand be better than this? - Parit Wacharasindhu | Time to Talk EP.22
data.description:
Can Thailand Be Better Than This? 
Join us on Time to Talk as we sit down with Itim Parit Wacharasindhu, List MP from the opposition People’s Party.

data.title: Thai airlines expand routes to capitalise on booming Indian tourism
data.description: Indian tourist arrivals expected to surpass pre-pandemic levels this year

data.title: Pheu Thai offers to withdraw bill to reduce military’s power
data.description: Prayut Siripanich cites opposition from society and coalition parties

data.title: Parliament hosts 2024 Constitution Day Celebration
data.description: Event features various activities at Parliament building throughout Monday and Tuesday

data.title: Thai authorities ramp up efforts against illegal imports, businesses
data.description: Measures like stricter VAT collection, enhanced product testing and regulatory reforms have already reduced illegal imports by 27%

data.title: Thailand mourns the loss of vocal icon Santi Loonpe
data.description: The national artist, who was known for his legendary renditions of King Rama IX’s compositions and patriotic songs, dies at age 88

data.title: True Corp says it seeks fairness in NBTC’s DTAC merger approval
data.description: Company argues that the NBTC's post-merger requirements for True are overly stringent

data.title: FTI review analyses Prime Minister Paetongtarn's governance

data.title: Land Bank to continue supporting farmers, govt says
